title: Heavenly Health Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Lots of vegan choices including a veggie sandwich with grilled eggplant, roasted peppers and spinach; lentil, tempeh, and veggie burgers. All food is made-to-order so can be easily made vegan like the portobello mushroom burger and panini - just omit cheese. Owner will make any breakfast item with vegan milk options. As of May 2013, juice bar opening soon.
